nodes.text: A sentient species was characterized by tentacle-like growths on its members' faces.
The species had large faces with small tentacled mouths, similar to a Quarren, and had two small organic horns near their nostrils. They also had stout hands and feet with no nails.

Some members of the species were the survivors of a shipwreck that crashed on the planet Balnab, and the survivors settled down and became the only intelligent species on the world. C-3PO and R2-D2 landed on Balnab after the ship became low on fuel and some of those survivors held them hostage and took them to the "god" of Balnab, named Albee Dewaw. Soon after, R2 and C-3PO uncovered the truth behind the "god" (a group of pit droids), much to the fury of the species as they believed Albee Dewaw to be a real entity.
The bounty hunter Oked was also a member of this tentacle-faced species.
The owner of the cantina Plop Dribble's, Loubo, was also a member of this species, as well as a customer seen inside Plop Dribble's.
A member of this species lived in he settlement of Pons Ora on the planet Abafar.
